app_descript:
AuroraWatch UK

Brief: AuroraWatch UK is a mobile application designed to provide real-time alerts and information regarding aurora borealis sightings within the UK. Developed by Smallbouldering Projects, this app informs users when there's a possibility to view this natural phenomenon, leveraging data sourced from Lancaster University's magnetometer networks.
